title: LiftFire Development Roadmap
subtitle: Our journey to build the ultimate fitness tracking experience

intro.title: The Future of Fitness Tracking
intro.description: We're constantly evolving LiftFire based on user feedback and cutting-edge technology. Here's what's coming next on our journey to revolutionize fitness tracking.
intro.philosophy: Our development philosophy focuses on user feedback, technical excellence, and meaningful features that actually improve your fitness journey.

q4-2023.title: Q4 2023 - Foundation
q4-2023.description: Establishing the foundation with essential workout tracking features

q1-2024.title: Q1 2024 - Foundation Complete
q1-2024.description: We've established the core infrastructure that makes LiftFire unique - offline-first architecture, comprehensive exercise database, and the beginning of our gamification system.
features: Progressive Web App (PWA) with offline functionality

q2-2024.title: Q2 2024 - Gamification & Social
q2-2024.description: We're expanding our gamification system and building the social features that will connect fitness enthusiasts worldwide.
features: Advanced achievement system with 100+ unique achievements
Social fitness network with gym friends
Enhanced streak system with flexible scheduling
successMetrics: 50% of users add at least one friend

q3-2024.title: Q3 2024 - AI & Intelligence
q3-2024.description: Introducing AI-powered features that will analyze your progress, detect plateaus, and provide personalized recommendations to optimize your training.
features: AI workout recommendations based on your progress
Recovery optimization and rest day planning
successMetrics: Advanced analytics used by 70% of Pro users

q4-2024.title: Q4 2024 - Platform Expansion
q4-2024.description: Expanding LiftFire to native mobile apps, wearable devices, and creating partnerships with gyms and equipment manufacturers.
features: Apple Watch and Wear OS integration
successMetrics: 50% of Elite users use trainer features

longTerm.title: 2025 and Beyond
longTerm.subtitle: The Future of Fitness Technology
longTerm.description: Our long-term vision includes AR/VR integration, advanced AI coaching, global fitness challenges, and building the world's largest connected fitness community.

goals.title: AI Fitness Coach
goals.description: Advanced AI that understands your goals, preferences, and progress to provide personalized coaching

goals.title: AR/VR Integration
goals.description: Augmented and virtual reality workout experiences with immersive form analysis

goals.title: Global Fitness Community
goals.description: Worldwide challenges, competitions, and fitness events through the platform

goals.title: Health Ecosystem
goals.description: Integration with healthcare providers, nutritionists, and wellness professionals

community.title: Community Input
community.subtitle: Your Voice Shapes Our Roadmap
community.description: We actively listen to our community and incorporate user feedback into our development priorities.
